welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hanoi, the charming capital of Vietnam! Get ready to immerse yourself in its rich history, bustling markets, and delicious street food. Enjoy your time exploring all the wonders this city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Kan (Khang 寛)
restaurants.description: Kan (Khang 寛) is a japanese restaurant located in Hai Bà Trưng.
restaurants.address: 322 Bà Triệu (Lê Đại Hành), Hai Bà Trưng, Thành Phố Hà Nội

restaurants.name: Bánh Cuốn Thanh Trì Bà Hoành
restaurants.description: Bánh Cuốn Thanh Trì Bà Hoành is a vietnamese restaurant located in Hai Bà Trưng.
restaurants.address: 66 Tô Hiến Thành (Bùi Thị Xuân), Hai Bà Trưng, Thành Phố Hà Nội

restaurants.name: Bún Chả Hương Liên
restaurants.description: Bún Chả Hương Liên is a noodle restaurant located in Hà Nội.
restaurants.address: 24 Lê Văn Hưu, Hà Nội, Thành Phố Hà Nội

restaurants.name: Phở Thìn 13 Lò Đúc
restaurants.description: Phở Thìn 13 Lò Đúc is a noodle restaurant located in Hà Nội.
restaurants.address: 13 Lò Đúc (Lê Văn Hưu), Hà Nội, Thành Phố Hà Nội

restaurants.name: Sumo BBQ
restaurants.description: Sumo BBQ is a japanese restaurant located in Hà Nội.
restaurants.address: 67 Tô Hiến Thành, Hà Nội, Thành Phố Hà Nội

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
